document_data.name: Gilded Palm
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Gilded Palm''' was a [[holy slayer]] organization in [[Zakhara]] whose members followed the teachings of [[Jisan]], the Zakharan goddess of fruitfulness.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|26}}

The symbol and favored weapon of the Gilded Palm was a dagger that had a coin-encrusted hilt.
document_data.Activities: The practices of the Guilded Palm almost made them appear as a group of assassins who could be hired. Holy slayers of the Gilded Palms regularly took jobs from merchants and other businessmen, since they believed anything that hindered bounty should be destroyed.
document_data.Base of Operations: Agents of the Gilded Palm were found throughout Zakhara.
